item.title: Bayes All the Way Up
item.description: Bayes Theorem is an equation for calculating certain kinds of conditional probabilities. For something so obscure, it’s attracted a surprisingly wide fanbase, including doctors , environmental scientists , economists , bodybuilders , fen-dwellers , and international smugglers . Eventually the hype reached the point where there was both a Bayesian cabaret and a Bayesian choir , popular books using Bayes’ Theorem to prove both the existence and the nonexistence of God, and even Bayesian dating advice .
